Crawler CLI

Contents

  • crawler
    • registry

Crawler CLI#

crawler#

Crawler CLI.

crawler [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options

--version#

Show the version and exit.

registry#

Get registry catalogs and collections.

crawler registry [OPTIONS]

Options

--get-collections, --no-get-collections#

Get list of registry collections.

--get-collection, --no-get-collection#

Get registry collection.

--get-catalogs, --no-get-catalogs#

Get list of registry catalogs.

--get-catalog, --no-get-catalog#

Get registry catalog.

--id <id>#

ID or ID filter.

--path <path>#

Path filter.
